content.p: Associate Professor, Dr. Lim received her Bachelor and Master degrees in Chemical Engineering from State University of New York at Buffalo (SUNY, Buffalo). She completed her PhD (Chemical Engineering) at the University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus (2015). She is now an associate professor in University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus. Her current research work focuses on composite materials for tissue engineering, supercapacitors and waste water treatment. Dr. Lim is the module convenor of Interfacial Chemistry, Industrial Process Analysis, MEP Project and Petroleum Refining ang Gas Processing.
